requirements.text: Provide project deployment readiness for a shareable URL on the Internet Computer by ensuring the app builds and runs cleanly with the provided template tooling; include minimal, clear deploy/run instructions in-project (e.g., in a visible documentation section or comments) that result in a publicly shareable canister URL after deployment.
